statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 10 \\ 6 \\ 14 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 17 \\ 6 \\ 22 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 32 \\ 18 \\ 46 \\ 23 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
